shuji (convert sourcemap back to javascript)
wscat (websocket cli)
js-beautify

@medv/blessed # a modern curses-like TUI with a high level API
@medv/eat # convert everything to json (yaml, toml, xml, ini, cli tables)
fx # interacive tui json viewer and query language

https://github.com/summerstyle/jsonTreeViewer.git # web-based interactive json viewer
